description: A masterpiece of beaux-arts architecture, the historic Royal Alexandra is Toronto's senior theatre and, at 101, never having been converted to any other use, the oldest continuously operating legitimate theatre in North America.The Royal Alexandra is also North America's first truly "royal" theatre - "royal" by patent from Edward VII - named with royal permission for his consort, Alexandra, a Danish princess and great-grandmother of the present queen.

reviews.title: Come From Away is the best show in town!
text: The Royal Alexandra Theatre is a historic landmark in Toronto.  It is over 100 years old, and is absolutely beautiful.  It is the oldest operating theatre in North America with 3 levels of seating.  No other 1200+ seat theatre is as intimate as the Royal Alexandra Theatre.  Right now the all Canadian cast of "Come From Away" continues its run at the Royal Alexandra Theatre.  The show runs for 100 minutes, with no intermission is it is spectactular.  The cast, (all but one, from the original Canadian cast) are incredibly talented.  They connect with audience from the first song "Welcome to the Rock" to the "Finale", bringing both smiles and tears to all throughout the show.  It is a must see production for everyone!

reviews.title: Stools should be included in the standing area.
text: The show we saw was amazing, and the venue was clean and very well preserved. My only suggestion would be for you to put stools where the standing area is. Give people the option for something to rest on. Also for reasons beyond anyone's control as our group had. One of the girls broke bones in her leg prior to the show and it was really hard for her to stand for 100 minutes straight. When she tried to sit against the wall for a few minutes, she was told by ushers she had to stand.

reviews.title: You'll wish you saw it sooner!
text: I mean, c'mon, how good could it be? Turns out, "Come From Away" is pretty great! Heart-warming story that begins on a heart-breaking day, and reminds us we're all on this Rock together. The music, the laughter, the tears, are woven through non-stop top-notch story-telling from start to finish. Take your friends and see it again!
